UPDATE:After only a few weeks I noticed that one of the guards tore at a narrow point. Too bad I really wanted to like them.ORIGINAL REVIEW:I was skeptical of this product just because of the mixed reviews. Inside the box was only a cardboard sleeve with two attached plastic sheets: one with the dust guards and the other a guide sticker.
